author: IGN
description:
In today's Daily Fix:
GameStop held its 'Trade Anything Day' promotional event where customers could come in with (almost) anything and get cash or store credit. GameStop shared with us some of the craziest trade-ins, such as a taxidermied bobcat, some McDonald's socks, and—get this— a Netflix Wii disc from way back when the Wii needed an authentication disc to stream content from the Netflix app. Did you try to trade anything in an GameStop? How much did you get for it? Let us know in the comments. In other news, fighting game legend Katsuhiro Harada is leaving Bandai Namco. Harada had been with the Tekken franchise for 30 years, working on each installment and directing Tekkens 3 through the recent Tekken 8. Harada has not yet said what he'll do next. And finally, take a peek into a family vacation at The Wizarding World of Harry Potter at Universal Orlando Resort.

Presented by Universal Orlando Resort.

#IGN
title: GameStop's 'Trade Anything Day' Was Wild - IGN Daily Fix

author: IGN
description:
Check out the K-9 Update Trailer for The Precinct, a top-down crime detective game developed by Fallen Tree Games. Players can now take a human's best friend on patrol to aid with a variety of different dilemmas. Choose from different breeds, subdue dangerous attackers, and sniff out concealed narcotics. The K-9 Update is available now for The Precinct on PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam and Epic Games Store).

#IGN #Gaming
title: The Precinct - Official K-9 Update Trailer

author: IGN
description:
The Alters gets a free new content update, featuring a new Module for the Gamer's Den, a card game, a new storyline and events, base customization, suit customization, a photo mode, a Relax mode, and a new save system. Watch the latest The Alters trailer for this sci-fil game featuring a blend of survival, adventure, and base-building elements. The Alters is available now on PC, Game Pass, Xbox Series X/S, and PlayStation 5 (PS5). 


In The Alters, help Jan Dolski, the sole survivor of an ill-fated space expedition, create alternative versions of himself to escape a hostile planet and tackle personal turmoils with this unconventional crew.

#IGN #Gaming
title: The Alters - Official Free Major Content Update Trailer | 11 Bit Studios Showcase 2025

Players will be able to access brand-new content with the upcoming Sanctuary of Sarras DLC, packed with new environments to explore, new threats to dispatch, and more.

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Early Access Launch Trailer for High Fructose, a first-person action melee-based roguelike game developed by Chazak Games. Players will embody a formidable ninja fox with a mere blade and the thirst to slice demon fruit. author: IGN
description:
Excited about season two of the Fallout TV show, and wanting to jump back into Fallout: New Vegas? We've got you covered, thanks to Wabbajack and the Viva New Vegas mod list.

In 2025, the best way to play FNV is using Wabbajack, and pairing it with the Viva New Vegas mod list, containing bug fixes, content additions, adding back in cut content, and more! With Fallout going to New Vegas in Fallout Season 2 on Amazon Prime, the best time to jump into Obsidian's fan fave Fallout Game; Fallout New Vegas. 

Want to download Viva New Vegas for your own Mojave Wasteland adventures? The link can be found here: https://vivanewvegas.moddinglinked.com/

What are your favourite New Vegas mods? Let us know in the comments!

#IGN #FalloutNewVegas #FalloutSeason2
title: The Best Way To Play Fallout New Vegas in 2025 With Mods

author: IGN
description:
The Mighty Nein is an hour long new animated series from the team at Critical Role, who also created the critically acclaimed series, The Legend of Vox Machina.

The Mighty Nein follows a group of fugitives and outcasts, bound by secrets and scars. But when a powerful arcane relic known as "The Beacon" falls into dangerous hands, they must learn to work together to save the realm and stop reality itself from unraveling. 

The Mighty Nein includes guest voice actors: Mark Strong, Alan Cumming, Tim McGraw, Anika Noni Rose, Ming-Na Wen, Auli’i Cravalho, Anjelica Huston, Lucy Liu, Nathan Fillion, T’Nia Miller, Graham McTavish, Ivanna Sankho, Rahul Kohli, Robbie Daymond, and Jonathan Frakes.

The Mighty Nein Season One Premieres Wednesday, November 19th. on Prime Video.
title: The Mighty Nein: Season 1 Exclusive Red Band Clip (2025) Ashley Johnson

author: IGN
description:
What's the best game of 2025? Here's our list of Nominees for Game of the Year 2025.
This was the year when the wait for Hollow Knight: Silksong finally ended, and proved that good things really do come to those who wait. But 2025 was just as much about fresh faces as it was long-awaited sequels, with Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 from new studio Sandfall Interactive being the topic of at least half of all gaming conversation for most of the year. 

Make sure to check back throughout the week starting on Monday, December 15. Throughout the week, we will announce the winners of our Best Xbox, PlayStation, and Nintendo game awards. This week of awards will culminate on Friday, December 19, when we will reveal IGN’s Game of the Year.

#IGN #Gaming #GameOfTheYear2025
title: IGN Game of the Year 2025 Nominees

author: IGN
description:
Quentin Tarantino got to finally film the missing chapter of the Kill Bill Saga. Suprisingly it was not shot on film, but inside Epic Games' Unreal Engine. Thanks to emerging technology such as Meta Human Generator and Unreal Engine 5, Tarantino was able to not only create the missing chapter of Kill Bill, Yukis Revenge, but also take the first step in the future of film making. 
We sat down with Epic’s CTO, Kim Libreri, Josh Wassung, Founder The Third Floor, and Pat Tubach, VFX Supervisor at Epic Games where they told us all about how they convinced Quentin Tarantino to make a movie in Fortnite, his directing style, and why this new technology opens doors for filmmakers of all budgets.
title: How Fortnite Got Quentin Tarantino to Direct A New Kill Bill Movie

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Cinematic Trailer for Band of Crusaders, a dark medieval strategy RPG developed by Virtual Alchemy and Ironward. Players will step into the role of a Grandmaster to explore a vast world, recruit willing crusaders, and face off against the demented in real-time combat. Lead an army into an apocalyptic war in Band of Crusaders, coming soon to PC (Steam and Epic Games Store), with a demo available now.

#BandOfCrusaders #Gaming #IGN
title: Band of Crusaders - Official Cinematic Story Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the All You Need Is Kill trailer for this upcoming animated action sci-fi drama film. All You Need Is Kill will feature its original Japanese language with subtitles, and will open in theaters nationwide beginning January 16, 2026.

Set in the year 20XX, ALL YOU NEED IS KILL follows the story of Rita, a resourceful but isolated young woman volunteering to help rebuild Japan after the mysterious appearance of a massive alien flower known as "Darol." When Darol unexpectedly erupts in a deadly event, unleashing monstrous creatures that decimate the population, Rita is caught in the destruction—and killed. But then she wakes up again. And again. Caught in an endless time loop, Rita must navigate the trauma and repetition of death until she crosses paths with Keiji, a shy young man trapped in the same cycle. Together, they fight to break free from the loop and find meaning in the chaos around them.

Produced by Warner Bros. Japan with animation production by acclaimed Japanese an
title: All You Need Is Kill - Official Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Watch this clip from the concert film, Rolling Stones – At the Max, as the legendary band performs their iconic song, "Honky Tonk Women." Rolling Stones - At the Max returns to IMAX for a limited engagement on December 10, 2025.

First released in 1991, Rolling Stones – At the Max is the critically acclaimed concert film starring Mick Jagger, Keith Richards, Charlie Watts, Ronnie Wood, and Bill Wyman. Filmed during the band’s 1990 Steel Wheels/Urban Jungle Tour, the result was the first-ever feature-length IMAX concert film, showcasing the incomparable talents of the Rolling Stones and their stadium-filling power. Packed with career-defining performances of iconic hits including “(I Can’t Get No) Satisfaction,” “Brown Sugar,” “Start Me Up,” and more, the film puts audiences at the heart of the crowd, where every moment is enhanced by IMAX’s unmatched scale and sound.

#IGN
title: Rolling Stones: At the Max - Exclusive 'Honky Tonk Women' Clip
